primary.context: Customer needs to pay annual maintenance fees or mortgage
primary.detail: The AI failed to verify the account using the provided account number and transferred the caller to concierge.

steps: Customer requested to make a payment.
Agent attempted to identify the caller by name and phone number.
Customer did not know the phone number on file.
Agent requested contract ID; customer offered account number or vacation ID.
Customer provided a long account number.
Agent failed to verify the account and transferred to concierge.

failure.detail: The agent was unable to locate or verify the account despite the customer providing a specific account number.

clarifications.note: Clarifying which ID types are acceptable

actions.detail: Attempted lookup with provided account number 872100275210
Transfer to concierge after verification failure

insights.summary: The customer wanted to make a payment but could not provide the phone number on the contract. After providing an account number, the AI failed to verify the record and transferred the call.
insights.verbatim: I just put the account number in there. You have to state It's eight seven two one zero zero two seven five two one o.
